September 1981: Monkey

Plays:

Monkey (五天竺)

Scenes:

The Ferry (渡し場)

Hakuren Parts with Her Baby (白蓮子別れ)

The Hell (地獄)

The Kinzanji Temple (径山寺)

The Caldron (釜煮)

The Isolated House (一つ家)

The River Ryusa (流沙川)

Characters:

Ryuko (劉洪)

Rihyo (李彪)

Chinkozui (陳光蕊)

Hakuren (女房白蓮)

King of Hell (閻魔大王)

Ogre (鬼)

Dead man (亡者)

Songoku (孫悟空)

Ungai (僧雲外)

Genjo, later known as Sanzohoshi (玄奘後に三蔵法師)

Fuyo, in fact Ginkaku (娘芙蓉実は銀角)

Friend of Fuyo's (芙蓉の友達)

Priest Homei (法明上人)

Saikakuen (才覚延)

Teremen (医者竹林テレメン)

Ryuko's wife (劉洪の妻)

Chogohachi, later known as Chohakkai (猪悟八後に猪八戒)

Gaikotsu, later known as Sagojo (骸骨後に沙悟浄)

Jagatara-no-gon (手下じゃがたらの権)

Shabbily-clothed woman (賤の女)

Boatman (船人)

Buddha (釈迦如来)

Flower peddler (花売女)

Donketsu (手下どん穴)

Townsman (里人)

Rasetsujo (羅刹女)

Gyumao (牛魔王)

Chinkozui, in fact Ryuko (陳光蕊 実は 劉洪)

Nikuryokan, in fact Rihyo (肉良甘 実は 李彪)

Flower peddler, in fact Hakuren (花売女 実は 白蓮)

Inkaizan, in fact Chinkozui (殷開山 実は 陳光蕊)

Sanzohoshi, in fact Songoku (三蔵法師実は孫悟空)
